We are Vortex: experienced, independent and supported

Experienced

Vortex started its technology development in 2005 by former Wind&Site engineers (with more than 20 years of experience, then), atmospheric physicists and computer experts in a unusual collaborative team of experienced professionals with active researchers.

Independent

Vortex is a private company, owned by its members and independent of any investment fund or consultancy firm. We have developed our own technology and do not depend on third parties to modify it.

Supported

At Vortex we are not alone: our technology is based, among other sources (satellites…), on WRF, a state-of-the-art non-linear flow code developed through a collaborative effort by several atmospheric research centers and an active community.
